He was part of the squad that raided the Sato estate in search of a hidden Equalist factory beneath Hiroshi Sato's mansion, aided Tarrlok during his mass-arrest of nonbenders in the Dragon Flats borough, and was captured along with Chief Saikhan by Equalists at the police headquarters during the battle for Republic City.

paragraphs.body: Song proved several times to be an extremely loyal and dutiful police officer who never questions his superiors. Even when Councilman Tarrlok ordered the police force to arrest innocent nonbenders, Song followed the command without hesitation, proving his extreme loyalty to the police. However, he reacts to criminal or disrespectful behavior with anger, evidenced by his outraged attitude toward Korra's attempt to escape the police by knocking Captain Saikhan over.
